channel.title: How do i put my server in a .zip format?

item.title: How do i put my server in a .zip format?
item.dc:creator: @Eportal Eportal
item.description:
@Eportal wrote:

Uhhh. Download winRaR (search it in google) and then get the folder you want to upload , right click it and press add to foldername.rar. Then wait till it compresses it and then Upload!

Read full topic

item.title: How do i put my server in a .zip format?
item.dc:creator: @kingstun kingstun
item.description:
@kingstun wrote:

Right-click on your server folder and you see sharing and sercurity then add to server folder name here and there you go get a .rar or inotherwords .zip!You must need WinRar!

item.title: How do i put my server in a .zip format?
item.dc:creator: @Eportal Eportal
item.description:
@Eportal wrote:

Go to www.megaupload.com and you will see at the top of the page Select file to send. Click on Browseâ€¦ and select the file you want to upload. Must be in a .RaR or .Zip format. Then write a description at the bottom of the megaupload page. Then press i agree with terms and conditions then SEND And wait for it to upload (if its a big file may take 1 hour) and then when you see the letters that say upload complete, you will see an internet adress on the top right corner of the page, copy and paste that into a .txt folder (incase you need to keep it) and there you go, you have uploaded, now share the link with your friends and they can download whatever you uploaded.

Read full topic
